name: Telegram Video Player Bot
description: An Telegram Bot By @AsmSafone To Stream Videos in Voice Chat

API_ID.description: User Account Telegram API_ID get it from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: User Account Telegram API_HASH get it from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram Bot Token, get it from @Botfather XD

SESSION_STRING.description: Pyrogram Session String of User Account, get it from @genStr_robot

SUDO_USERS.description: ID of Sudo Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

ASSISTANT_NAME.description: Your Video Player's assistant Username without @.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Support Group username without @ [Leave this if you don't have one]

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Updates Channel username without @ [Leave this if you don't have one].

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
